text.section: The Department shall adopt regulations that set standards for juvenile detention facilities operated by the Department and by private agencies under contract with the Department.

The standards shall reflect the following central purposes of juvenile detention:
to protect the public;
to provide a safe, humane, and caring environment for children; and
to provide access to required services for children.
The standards shall be consistent with this title and Title 3, Subtitle 8A of the Courts Article.
